turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello....how are you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi, how's it going? I'm not bad, tired though

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I feel the same. It's been a long day.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah... so what are we supposed to talk about, as far as social issues?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, there is a charity called Save The Children that is desperate for donations no matter how small to help children in war torn and third world countries. How do you feel about that?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I've heard about the organization. I guess I would be willing to make a small donation towards the org, but I wish the process of how the money gets to these countries was more transparent

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know what you mean but I'm willing to donate a little. I keep thinking that if everyone just gave $1 how that could add up to really help some poor kids. I was lucky to have everything I needed when I was growing up. I would like to try to help someone else.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah, I grew up pretty poor, not third world poor, but I know what it\'s like to go hungry. It\'s terrible and there really is enough wealth in the world to "solve" poverty. Honestly governments and corporations could work together to do this, but yeah, every person donating say $1 a day of course makes a difference too

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much would you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment which is $2.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'll donate $0.10.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok, thanks! The research team will collect all donations and send them to Save The Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Awesome, thanks for chatting.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thanks, have a nice day!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You too. Bye!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I think we have to chat a bit longer. I think we're supposed to each do 10 chats and we've only done 7.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh ok, it says to go until a donation agreement is reached. How much will you donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm willing to donate $1.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You're very generous. 1/2 your payment. Going by the tithing rule (10%), I should have donated $0.20. :)

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I just feel that I like to share since it is money I didn't expect to make in the first place. There's always someone out there who has it worse than I do by far and if $1 helps it will make me feel good to help even just a little.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: True, true, that makes sense. I guess I'm more pragmatic. Sure, there are people out there who have it relatively worse than us, but it's still a struggle, and I can't justify giving up half my earnings. I mean, for me, this is my side income (Mturk). Anyway, hope we're close to 10 chats

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We finally did the 10 chats! Thanks for your donation! Every little bit does help. Goodbye!
